Results
Built on top of the model in but excluding ELMo , our base reinforced model improves the average F 1 score around 2 points ( statistical significant t- test with p < 0.05 ) compared with .

state - of the - art performance.from sentence: Overall , our full model achieves the state - of the - art performance of 73.8 % F1 - score when using ELMo and entropy regularization ( compared to models marked with * in , and our approach simultaneously obtains the best F1 -score of 70.5 % when using fixed word embedding only .

entropy regularization.from sentence: Regarding our model , using entropy regularization to encourage exploration can improve the result by 1 point .

context - dependent ELMo embedding.from sentence: Moreover , introducing the context - dependent ELMo embedding to our base model can further boosts the performance , which is consistent with the results in .
